snippet: Some officers sworn to fight the drug trade along the Texas border with Mexico give in to the temptation of corruption, authorities say.
abstract: Authorities say officers sworn to fight drug trade along Texas border with Mexico sometimes give in to temptation of corruption, earning cash by helping vehicles transporting marijuana and cocaine avoid detection from law enforcement.
lead_paragraph: Some officers sworn to fight the drug trade along the Texas border with Mexico give in to the temptation of corruption, authorities say.

headline.seo: Texas Officers Accused of Helping Drug Smugglers
headline.main: In Drug Fight on Texas Border, Some Officers Play Both Sides
headline.print_headline: In Drug Fight on Texas Border, Some Officers Play Both Sides
